title: Britton Burnworth, PWS Joins Atwell
text:
PITTSBURGH--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Consulting, engineering and construction services firm Atwell, LLC is pleased to welcome Britton Burnworth, PWS to our team as Project Manager, Environmental. Based in Atwell’s Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania office, Burnworth is responsible for building Atwell’s environmental practice, managing project resources, leading his team’s project quality control, and maintaining project budgets and schedules for projects throughout Pennsylvania and the Northeast.
Burnworth brings more than 17 years of experience in providing environmental solutions to transportation, commercial, oil, natural gas, and local government projects. His project management background includes the oversight of large linear and complex projects, contractor oversight, budgeting, and regulatory compliance. His technical experience includes wetland delineation, mitigation and monitoring, terrestrial and aquatic habitat assessments, watershed assessments and planning, ecological surveys and threatened and endangered species coordination. He also has experience with National Environmental Policy Act (NEPA) documentation, state and federal permitting, natural gas pipeline routing, well pad feasibility and siting, and compliance monitoring. He brings a strong working knowledge of regulations and impact on various projects within the states of New York, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Virginia, and West Virginia.
Burnworth earned his Bachelor of Science degree in Biology with a major in Terrestrial Ecology and minor in Geology from University of Pittsburgh. He is a certified Professional Wetland Scientist and has obtained Ecological, Waterways Permitting, and Categorical Exclusion Prequalifications from Ohio Department of Transportation.
“Britton is a great addition to our team,” says Mike Koenig, Team Leader. “His dual project management and environmental experience will make him a great asset for our company and future project opportunities.”
Atwell, LLC is a national consulting, engineering and construction services firm with over five hundred professionals across the country that deliver a broad range of strategic and creative solutions to clients in a variety of industries including real estate and land development, power and energy, and oil and gas. They provide comprehensive turnkey services including land and ROW support, planning, landscape architecture, engineering, land surveying, environmental science, and project and program management.
